ingredients: 15 lbs 11.2 oz - UK Pale Ale Malt (3.0 SRM) (Grain)
2 lbs 8.0 oz - US Chocolate Malt (350.0 SRM) (Grain)
2 lbs 8.0 oz - US Roasted Barley (300.0 SRM) (Grain)
1 lbs 16.0 oz - US White Wheat Malt (2.5 SRM) (Grain)
2.6 oz - German Northern Brewer [6.5%] - Boil 60 min (Hops)
2.0 oz - German Northern Brewer [6.5%] - Boil 30 min (Hops)
1.0 oz - German Northern Brewer [6.5%] - Boil 15 min (Hops)
name: Mike Riddle's Tricentennial Stout
